column4:
['Naram garam rat me garam garam chand par', '
Naram garam rat me garam garam chand par', '
Hath lag gaya jaha chhala pad gaya waha', '
Wo bhi gol gol tha ye bhi gol gol hai', '
Wo bhi gol gol tha ye bhi gol gol hai', '
Naram garam rat me garam garam chand par', '
Naram garam rat me garam garam chand par', '
Hath lag gaya jaha chhala pad gaya waha', '
Wo bhi gol gol tha ye bhi gol gol hai', '
Wo bhi gol gol tha ye bhi gol gol hai', 'Garam garam chhale ka naram naram chhilka tha', '
Chilka chila to waha pe phir se ek chand tha', '
Garam garam chhale ka naram naram chilka tha', '
Chilka chila to waha pe phir se ek chand tha', '
Wo bhi gol gol hai ye bhi gol gol hai', '
Wo bhi gol gol hai ye bhi gol gol hai', '
Naram garam rat me garam garam chand par', '
Naram garam rat me garam garam chand par', '
Hath lag gaya jaha chhala pad gaya waha', '
Wo bhi gol gol tha ye bhi gol gol hai', '
Wo bhi gol gol tha ye bhi gol gol hai', 'Garam tha chhilka ha ha ha naram tha chhilka', '
Chhilke ka chhilka na na na chhale ka chhilka', '
Chhilka chil chhilka chil chhilka chil', '
Chand chhilke jara dekhe kaisa hal hai', '
Lagta hai ye bhi to ek gol mal hai', '
Are chand chilke jara dekhe kaisa hal hai', '
Lagta hai ye bhi to ek gol mal hai', '
Are chand chilke jara dekhe kaisa hal hai', '
Lagta hai ye bhi to ek gol mal hai', '
Wo bhi gol gol tha ye bhi gol gol hai', '
Wo bhi gol gol tha ye bhi gol gol hai', '
Naram garam rat me garam garam chand par', '
Naram garam rat me garam garam chand par', '
Hath lag gaya jaha chhala pad gaya waha', '
Wo bhi gol gol tha ye bhi gol gol hai', '
Wo bhi gol gol tha ye bhi gol gol hai', '
Naram naram garam garam hai', '
Naram naram garam garam hai', '
Golmal golmal hai golmal golmal hai.']
